network.// comment ietf-te-topology:te: presence container requires: provider-id, client-id and te-topology-id

ietf-network:node.// comment supporting-node: Not used because topology hierarchy is outside the scope of this JSON example

ietf-te-topology:te.// not-present tunnel-termination-point: ETH Access Links only (no ETH TE switching)

ietf-te-topology:te.name: AN1-1 LTP
ietf-te-topology:te.// not-present interface-switching-capab: ETH Access Link only (no ETH TE switching)
ietf-te-topology:te.// comment inter-domain-plug-id: Use of plug-id for access Link is outside the scope of this document

ietf-network-topology:termination-point.// comment ietf-eth-te-topology:ingress-: Outside the scope of this JSON example

ietf-te-topology:te.name: AN1-8 LTP
ietf-te-topology:te.// not-present interface-switching-capab: ETH Access Link only (no ETH TE switching)
ietf-te-topology:te.// comment inter-domain-plug-id: Use of plug-id for access Link is outside the scope of this document

ietf-network-topology:termination-point.// comment ingress-bandwidth-profile: Outside the scope of this JSON example

te-link-attributes.name: Access Link from AN1-1
te-link-attributes.// not-present external-domain: The plug-id is used instead of this container
te-link-attributes.// not-present is-abstract: The access link is not abstract
te-link-attributes.// not-present interface-switching-capab: ETH Access Link only (no ETH TE switching)
te-link-attributes.// not-present label-restrictions: ETH Access Link only (no ETH TE switching)
te-link-attributes.// not-present max-link-bandwidth: ETH Access Link only (no ETH TE switching)
te-link-attributes.// not-present max-resv-link-bandwidth: ETH Access Link only (no ETH TE switching)
te-link-attributes.// not-present unreserved-bandwidth: ETH Access Link only (no ETH TE switching)

ietf-te-topology:te.// not-present is-transitional: It is not a transitional link

te-link-attributes.// not-present external-domain: The plug-id is used instead of this container
te-link-attributes.// not-present is-abstract: The access link is not abstract
te-link-attributes.// not-present interface-switching-capab: ETH Access Link only (no ETH TE switching)
te-link-attributes.// not-present label-restrictions: ETH Access Link only (no ETH TE switching)
